content: अंति {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [अंत्-इ] <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Near, before, in the presence of; न ही नु वो मरुतो अंत्यस्मे <ls>Rv. 1. 167. 9</ls>; <ls n="Rv.">1. 79. 11.</ls> {@--2@} (Prep.) To, in the vicinity of (with <ab>gen.</ab>); मुग्धप्रभीतवदुपेयतुरंति मात्रोः <ls>Bhāg.</ls> --तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} An elder sister (in dramas).
